meanings.definition: The act of covering or sealing with tape.
meanings.sent1: During the tapings, the box was securely wrapped with tape.
meanings.sent2: She quickly finished the tapings on the package before sending it out.
meanings.sent3: The tapings on the present were so neat that it looked like a professional job.
meanings.sent4: Her tapings of the box were like a protective shield around the gift.
meanings.sent5: The tapings on the box were so tight that even air couldn't escape.

meanings.definition: The recorded material on a tape.
meanings.sent1: The tapings on the cassette contained his favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: She carefully labeled each tape with the tapings inside.
meanings.sent3: His mixtape had tapings of all the classic hits.
meanings.sent4: The tapings on the recording captured every sound perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The tapings on the tape held memories that could be replayed anytime.

meanings.definition: The process of recording or broadcasting a television or radio program.
meanings.sent1: The tapings for the show took place in the studio.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed watching the tapings of her favorite sitcom.
meanings.sent3: The tapings of the live broadcast went smoothly without any glitches.
meanings.sent4: The tapings of the program were done in front of a live audience.
meanings.sent5: Attending the tapings of the talk show was an exciting experience.
